definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The solution is to break up this insulating layer of hot water by agitation.
sentences.chinese: 方案是用攪拌的方法打破熱水構成的隔熱層。

sentences.english: On site experiment at oil field proves that the heat barrier pipe made by welding method has rather good quality.
sentences.chinese: 焊接的隔熱管經油田現場試驗，結果表明其性能良好。

sentences.english: When the window frame is closed , its joint will be tight and resistant to sound and heat.
sentences.chinese: 窗扇關閉時，接縫嚴密，具有良好的隔音，隔熱效果。

sentences.english: Cryogenic liquid cylinders are insulated, vacuum-jacketed, pressure vessels.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個隔熱的有真空夾層的壓力容器。

sentences.english: So this is a constant pressure calorimeter.
sentences.chinese: 它做了很好的隔熱處理。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the key way of energy-saving is to use the inorganic thermal insulation material.
sentences.chinese: 目前，建築節能的主要途徑是採用保溫隔熱材料。

sentences.english: We caring of you by the usage of the wood handle to protect you.
sentences.chinese: 別具匠心的木質的把手更是給你貼身的隔熱保護。

sentences.english: Preeminent heat-retaining performance in winter and heat-insulating performance in summer are available.
sentences.chinese: 卓越的冬季保溫和夏季隔熱功能。

sentences.english: In the off-position, has the good leak-proof quality as well as the heat insulation sound-insulated performance.
sentences.chinese: 在關閉狀態，有良好的密封性以及隔熱隔音性能。

sentences.english: For the world's high-temperature insulation thermal conductivity of the area of one of the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 爲目前世界上高溫隔熱領域熱導率最低的材料之一。

sentences.english: In the cold regions, both heat preservation and thermal insulation compound walls can be assembled.
sentences.chinese: 在寒冷和嚴寒地區，可組合成及保溫有隔熱的複合牆。

sentences.english: Better insulation standards for buildings can be had instantly.
sentences.chinese: 更規範的建築物隔熱標準能很快出臺。

sentences.english: Heat-proof baskets lined with bitumen were used for fermenting and storing beer.
sentences.chinese: 用瀝青隔熱的籃子是用以發酵和貯存啤酒的。

sentences.english: It is also non-flammable and is therefore used for fire insulation and similar purposes.
sentences.chinese: 它也是非易燃，因此，防火隔熱和類似用途使用。

sentences.english: Rock wool carpet heat preservation is low thermal conductivity of a kind of high quality thermal insulation material.
sentences.chinese: 岩棉保溫氈是導熱係數低的一種優質的保溫隔熱材料。

sentences.english: Pour the mixture into a dish, add fillet. Steam for 15 minutes over boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 鯇魚片放入有蛋的碟中，隔熱水蒸15分鐘。

definition: to let air pass through/to ventilate
